com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium

Class NotificationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.NotificationService

  • public final class NotificationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to HTML5 desktop notifications functionality.
    提供对HTML5桌面通知功能的访问。

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NotificationHandler getNotificationHandler()
      Returns handler that is registered to receive browser common notification events from the browser associated with this NotificationService browser context.
      返回注册为从与此NotificationService浏览器上下文关联的浏览器接收浏览器常见通知事件的处理程序。
      void setNotificationHandler(NotificationHandler handler)
      Sets the specified notification handler to receive browser common notification events from the browser.
      设置指定的通知处理程序以从浏览器接收浏览器常见的通知事件。

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getNotificationHandler

        public NotificationHandler getNotificationHandler()
        Returns handler that is registered to receive browser common notification events from the browser associated with this NotificationService browser context.
        返回注册为从与此NotificationService浏览器上下文关联的浏览器接收浏览器常见通知事件的处理程序。
        Returns:
        NotificationHandler instance if is registered. Otherwise returns null. 实例（如果已注册）。否则返回。

      • setNotificationHandler

        public void setNotificationHandler(NotificationHandler handler)
        Sets the specified notification handler to receive browser common notification events from the browser. Browser instance which events will be handled by this handler is the one which context is associated with this notification service.

        If handler is null, notification events from browser related to this NotificationService browser context will not be handled.

        设置指定的通知处理程序以从浏览器接收浏览器常见的通知事件。该处理程序将处理事件的浏览器实例是与该通知服务关联的上下文。如果handler为null，则不会处理来自与该NotificationService浏览器上下文相关的浏览器的通知事件。
        Parameters:
        handler - the NotificationHandler instance. -实例。
